DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare relative contribution systemic inflammation vs. Obstructive Sleep Apnea ( OSA ) severity ( measure Apnea Hypopnea Index ) predict cardiovascular metabolic aberration associate mild-to-moderate obstructive sleep apnea .
DOC.brief_title: Predicting Cardiometabolic Risk Mild-to-Moderate Obstructive Sleep Apnea : Inflammation vs. Apnea/Hypopnea Index
DOC.criteria: Mild moderate OSA ( 5≤ AHI < 30 ) BMI ≤ 45 Age ≥ 18 Men & Women AHI ≥ 30 BMI > 45 Current use steroid antiinflammatory medication Diagnosis insulin dependent diabetes Diagnosis autoimmune disorder Shiftwork Current use CPAP
